subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ Mark Teixeira was expected to return from the disabled list Friday and reclaim his position at first from Lyle Overbay, who has racked up 29 runs batted in.
snippet: The Yankees’ Mark Teixeira was expected to return from the disabled list Friday and reclaim his position at first from Lyle Overbay, who has racked up 29 runs batted in.
